00020 #define VL_LOG_OF_2 0.693147180559945

00023 #define VL_PI 3.141592653589793
00024 
00032 #define VL_EPSILON_F 1.19209290E-07F
00033 
00040 #define VL_EPSILON_D 2.220446049250313e-16
00041 
00042 /*
00043    For the code below: An ANSI C compiler takes the two expressions,
00044    LONG_VAR and CHAR_VAR, and implicitly casts them to the type of the
00045    first member of the union. Refer to K&R Second Edition Page 148,
00046    last paragraph.
00047 */
00048 
00050 static union { vl_uint32 raw ; float value ; }
00051   const vl_nan_f =
00052     { 0x7FC00000UL } ;
00053 
00055 static union { vl_uint32 raw ; float value ; }
00056   const vl_infinity_f =
00057     { 0x7F800000UL } ;
00058 
00060 static union { vl_uint64 raw ; double value ; }
00061   const vl_nan_d =
00062 #ifdef VL_COMPILER_MSC
00063     { 0x7FF8000000000000ui64 } ;
00064 #else
00065     { 0x7FF8000000000000ULL } ;
00066 #endif
00067 
00069 static union { vl_uint64 raw ; double value ; }
00070   const vl_infinity_d =
00071 #ifdef VL_COMPILER_MSC
00072     { 0x7FF0000000000000ui64 } ;
00073 #else
00074     { 0x7FF0000000000000ULL } ;
00075 #endif

00104 VL_INLINE
00105 float vl_mod_2pi_f (float x)
00106 {
00107   while (x > 2 * VL_PI) x -= (float) (2 * VL_PI) ;
00108   while (x < 0.0F     ) x += (float) (2 * VL_PI);
00109   return x ;
00110 }
00111 
00112 VL_INLINE
00113 double vl_mod_2pi_d (double x)
00114 {
00115   while (x > 2 * VL_PI) x -= 2 * VL_PI ;
00116   while (x < 0.0      ) x += 2 * VL_PI ;
00117   return x ;
00118 }
00128 VL_INLINE
00129 int
00130 vl_floor_f (float x)
00131 {
00132   int xi = (int) x ;
00133   if (x >= 0 || (float) xi == x) return xi ;
00134   else return xi - 1 ;
00135 }
00136 
00137 VL_INLINE
00138 int
00139 vl_floor_d (double x)
00140 {
00141   int xi = (int) x ;
00142   if (x >= 0 || (double) xi == x) return xi ;
00143   else return xi - 1 ;
00144 }
00145 /* @} */

00154 VL_INLINE float
00155 vl_abs_f (float x)
00156 {
00157 #ifdef VL_COMPILER_GNU
00158   return __builtin_fabsf (x) ;
00159 #else
00160   return fabsf(x) ;
00161 #endif
00162 }
00163 
00164 VL_INLINE double
00165 vl_abs_d (double x)
00166 {
00167 #ifdef VL_COMPILER_GNU
00168   return __builtin_fabs (x) ;
00169 #else
00170   return fabs(x) ;
00171 #endif
00172 }
00212 VL_INLINE
00213 float
00214 vl_fast_atan2_f (float y, float x)
00215 {
00216   float angle, r ;
00217   float const c3 = 0.1821F ;
00218   float const c1 = 0.9675F ;
00219   float abs_y    = vl_abs_f (y) + VL_EPSILON_F ;
00220 
00221   if (x >= 0) {
00222     r = (x - abs_y) / (x + abs_y) ;
00223     angle = (float) (VL_PI / 4) ;
00224   } else {
00225     r = (x + abs_y) / (abs_y - x) ;
00226     angle = (float) (3 * VL_PI / 4) ;
00227   }
00228   angle += (c3*r*r - c1) * r ;
00229   return (y < 0) ? - angle : angle ;
00230 }
00231 
00232 VL_INLINE
00233 double
00234 vl_fast_atan2_d (double y, double x)
00235 {
00236   double angle, r ;
00237   double const c3 = 0.1821 ;
00238   double const c1 = 0.9675 ;
00239   double abs_y    = vl_abs_d (y) + VL_EPSILON_D ;
00240 
00241   if (x >= 0) {
00242     r = (x - abs_y) / (x + abs_y) ;
00243     angle = VL_PI / 4 ;
00244   } else {
00245     r = (x + abs_y) / (abs_y - x) ;
00246     angle = 3 * VL_PI / 4 ;
00247   }
00248   angle += (c3*r*r - c1) * r ;
00249   return (y < 0) ? - angle : angle ;
00250 }
00284 VL_INLINE
00285 float
00286 vl_fast_resqrt_f (float x)
00287 {
00288   /* 32-bit version */
00289   union {
00290     float x ;
00291     vl_int32  i ;
00292   } u ;
00293 
00294   float xhalf = (float) 0.5 * x ;
00295 
00296   /* convert floating point value in RAW integer */
00297   u.x = x ;
00298 
00299   /* gives initial guess y0 */
00300   u.i = 0x5f3759df - (u.i >> 1);
00301   /*u.i = 0xdf59375f - (u.i>>1);*/
00302 
00303   /* two Newton steps */
00304   u.x = u.x * ( (float) 1.5  - xhalf*u.x*u.x) ;
00305   u.x = u.x * ( (float) 1.5  - xhalf*u.x*u.x) ;
00306   return u.x ;
00307 }
00308 
00309 VL_INLINE
00310 double
00311 vl_fast_resqrt_d (double x)
00312 {
00313   /* 64-bit version */
00314   union {
00315     double x ;
00316     vl_int64  i ;
00317   } u ;
00318 
00319   double xhalf = (double) 0.5 * x ;
00320 
00321   /* convert floating point value in RAW integer */
00322   u.x = x ;
00323 
00324   /* gives initial guess y0 */
00325 #ifdef VL_COMPILER_MSC
00326   u.i = 0x5fe6ec85e7de30dai64 - (u.i >> 1) ;
00327 #else
00328   u.i = 0x5fe6ec85e7de30daLL - (u.i >> 1) ;
00329 #endif
00330 
00331   /* two Newton steps */
00332   u.x = u.x * ( (double) 1.5  - xhalf*u.x*u.x) ;
00333   u.x = u.x * ( (double) 1.5  - xhalf*u.x*u.x) ;
00334   return u.x ;
00335 }
00336 
00386 VL_INLINE float
00387 vl_fast_sqrt_f (float x)
00388 {
00389   return (x < 1e-8) ? 0 : x * vl_fast_resqrt_f (x) ;
00390 }
00391 
00392 VL_INLINE double
00393 vl_fast_sqrt_d (float x)
00394 {
00395   return (x < 1e-8) ? 0 : x * vl_fast_resqrt_d (x) ;
00396 }
00397 
00398 VL_INLINE vl_uint32 vl_fast_sqrt_ui32 (vl_uint32 x) ;
00399 VL_INLINE vl_uint16 vl_fast_sqrt_ui16 (vl_uint16 x) ;
00400 VL_INLINE vl_uint8  vl_fast_sqrt_ui8  (vl_uint8  x) ;
00401 
00404 #define VL_FAST_SQRT_UI(T, SFX)                 \
00405   T                                             \
00406   vl_fast_sqrt_ ## SFX (T x)                    \
00407   {                                             \
00408     T y = 0 ; /* w / 2^k */                     \
00409     T tmp = 0 ;                                 \
00410     int twok ;                                  \
00411                                                 \
00412     for (twok = 8 * sizeof(T) - 2 ;             \
00413          twok >= 0 ; twok -= 2) {               \
00414       y <<= 1 ; /* y = 2 * y */                 \
00415       tmp = (2*y + 1) << twok ;                 \
00416       if (x >= tmp) {                           \
00417         x -= tmp ;                              \
00418         y += 1 ;                                \
00419       }                                         \
00420     }                                           \
00421     return y ;                                  \
00422   }
00423 
00424 #ifdef __DOXYGEN__
00425 #undef VL_FAST_SQRT_UI
00426 #define VL_FAST_SQRT_UI(T,SFX)
00427 #endif
00428 
00429 VL_FAST_SQRT_UI(vl_uint32, ui32)
00430 VL_FAST_SQRT_UI(vl_uint16, ui16)
00431 VL_FAST_SQRT_UI(vl_uint8,  ui8 )

00442 typedef void VlDoubleVectorComparisonFunction ;
